name: Raven's Gate [NES]
description:
Information

Here's brand new action-adventure game for    Entertainment System!

This is my entry for  NESDev Coding Competition 2022. I wanted to create a NES game that will be inspired by classic adventure NES game "Legend of Zelda",  but would look and feel different.  

You start your journey as a hero in Golden Forest and your task is to go through world slain' enemies, collecting items and helping humans in quests. 

There are :

  •  More than 70 rooms to go through
  • 4 worlds ( Golden Forest , Frosty Mountains, The Boneyard and Raven's Gate )
  • Items and weapons  to equip
  • A lot of enemies to slay
  • 3 quests to complete
  • Shops to buy items from

Game can be played using emulator ( I recommend Mesen ) or using flash cart ( Everdrive, PowerPak ) on real NES device. I recommend setting blargg's shader and scanlines for more retro look when playing on emulator,  as game is intended and graphics are made  to be played on real CRT TV.
